item.title: Thirst grips 65 Raichur villages
item.description:
<![CDATA[
Raichur: The district is currently facing extreme heat, leading to significant water shortage in many lakes. Sources from the DC's office report that 65 villages are suffering from water scarcity.Residents in these villages are appealing to PDOs, taluk panchayat officers, and elected officials for a reliable water supply. Despite media attention, there are claims that officials are not adequately addressing the situation, resulting in public frustration with the authorities.Mallikarjun Uppar...]]>
